title: Consolidate LifeStage — consolidate_lifestage
text: Life stage categories smolt, fry, yearling, sub-yearling parr recoded "juveniles" summary analyses. Jacks subadult salmon steelhead recoded "adults", though reproductive value species expected less fully mature adults. Kelt steelhead recoded adults, left separate. egg lifestage removed salmon steelhead retained sturgeon, rockfish, eulachon, subadult category.

Renewals, amendments, modifications sequentially higher numbers variable letters R, , M, root file number . function eliminates hyphen subsequent characters root FileNumbers can matched past, current, applied permits.
